document_data.name: ''Door of derangement''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Doors of derangement''''' were [[dweomered door]] that inflict make the creatures walking through them [[blindness or deafness|blind, deaf]] and [[feeblemind]]ed as per the [[spell]]s. They would typically only effect every third creature to pass their threshold, although this could be changed.
document_data.Creation: These doors were created with the ''blindness or deafness'' and ''feeblemind spells''.
